Introduction
This topic contains information about handling IDES examination reports, including
MSC responsibility for monitoring the status of examination requests
transfer of examination reports into eFolders
MSC review of examination reports
actions MSCs must take once all examination reports are deemed complete
providing examination reports to PEBLOs
considering the sufficiency of IDES examinations for rating purposes
examination reports that reveal the existence of additional disabilities
DRAS actions if an examination report is insufficient
MSC actions if an examination report is insufficient
failure of an IDES participant to report for examination
, and
handling
an IDES participantâ€™s request to reschedule an examination
, and
PEBLO reports of missing examination results
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Development and Examinations
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F
